pages.cookies: Cookies Policy | Protection of your personal data CricketUp Home FAQ'S DOWNLOAD APP Welcome to the Culinary World of CricketUp What are Cookies? Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device (computer or mobile device) when you visit websites. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide information to the owners of the site. How We Use Cookies We use cookies for a variety of purposes, including: Ensuring the website functions properly Analyzing website traffic and usage patterns Personalizing your experience on our website Improving our services and offerings Types of Cookies We Use There are several types of cookies we may use: Essential Cookies: Necessary for the website to function properly. Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with the site, which allows us to optimize and improve it. Advertising Cookies: Used to deliver advertisements that are relevant to you and your interests. Preference Cookies: Enable the website to remember information that changes the way the site behaves or looks, such as your preferred language. Managing Cookies You can control and manage cookies in various ways. Most web browsers allow you to: View and delete cookies Block cookies from specific websites Block all cookies Set preferences for notifications when a cookie is set Changes to This Policy We may update our Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy | Protection of your personal data CricketUp Home FAQ'S DOWNLOAD APP Privacy Policy - CricketUp At CricketUp, safeguarding your privacy is our top priority. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. 1. Information We Collect: - We collect personal information, such as name, email, and phone number, when you use our services or sign up for our updates. - Additionally, we gather non-personal information, such as IP address, browser details, and device information, to enhance the functionality of our website and services. 2. Use of Your Information: - We use your personal information to process orders, facilitate communication, and provide customer support. - Non-personal information may be utilized for analytics, marketing initiatives, and improvements to our online platform. 3. Information Disclosure: - We do not trade, sell, or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we share data with trusted service providers for website operations and service delivery. 4. Data Protection Measures: - We implement stringent security protocols to safeguard your information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. 5. Your Rights: - You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data and may opt out of receiving promotional communications. 6. Policy Changes: - We reserve the right to update or revise this Privacy Policy at any time, with changes taking effect immediately upon publication. If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at CricketUp@gmail.com. Thank you for choosing CricketUp!
